## Install the app

If you are participating in a study using the **momenTUM** platform, install the mobile app on your device:

- [Apple App Store](https://apps.apple.com/de/app/tum-momentum/id6444047291?l=en-GB)
- [Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.tum.sg.momentum.android)

## During the study

Follow the instructions provided by your study team.  
The app will guide you through questionnaires and tasks according to the study schedule.
